atmosphere.description: Atmosphère is a work-in-progress customized firmware for the Nintendo Switch.

hekate.description: A GUI based Nintendo Switch Bootloader.

edizon.description: A homebrew save management, editing tool and memory trainer for Horizon (Nintendo Switch).

emuiibo.description: Virtual amiibo (amiibo emulation) system for Nintendo Switch.

hbappstore.description: Homebrew App Store - GUI for downloading/managing homebrew apps for video game consoles.

nxshell.description: A multi-purpose file manager for the Nintendo Switch.

nxmtp.description: An MTP responder for the Switch. (usb filetransfer)

tinwoo.description: A No-Bullshit-No-Bullshit NSP, NSZ, XCI, and XCZ Installer for Nintendo Switch.

deepseatoolbox.description: A toolbox that allows the user to manage the cfw

ldnmitm.description: Play local wireless supported games online. Visit lan-play.com for setup, help and details.

sysclk.description: Switch sysmodule allowing you to set cpu/gpu/mem clocks according to the running application and docked state.

syscon.description: This sysmodule aims to provide complete functionality for most popular game controllers not supported by Nintendo Switch. At the current moment, only USB connection is supported.

sysftpdlight.description: This is a nintendo-switch sysmodule which runs an ftpd-server in the background (on port 5000 with no auth).

nxovlloader.description: Host process for loading Switch overlay OVLs.

teslamenu.description: The initial overlay menu to be loaded by nx-ovlloader. It's main purpose is to let the user select other overlays to be loaded.

ovlsysmodules.description: A Tesla overlay that allows you to toggle sysmodules on the fly

statusmonitoroverlay.description: Monitor many stats of Nintendo Switch hardware

commonproblemresolver.description: Rescue your switch without a pc!

tegraexplorer.description: A payload-based file explorer for your switch!

deepseaassets.description: DeepSea related components that had no other place to be.

sigpatches.description: Sigpatches. You may need to add 'kip1patch=nosigchk' to your desired boot option in 'hekate_ipl.ini'.
